channel.title: Need Website Development Team for my RSPS
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I currently own a RuneScape Private Server, however I need some of the best website developers out there. I need php, HTML, css, and javascript coders for my website. We will start the website form scratch. I'm offering staff in-game and on the website for rewards of good job. The format to apply will be:
Name: Age: Country: Position you are interested in: Experience: Hours Available to work each day/weekend/week: Pictures of your work: Skype/MSN:
Positions Available:
GFX Designers: 0/2
Html: 1/2
PHP: 1/2
CSS and javascript: 1/2 css 0/2 javascript coders
I really need help considering I have school, x-box 360, etc. I will appreciate it if you apply for the development team, but if you don't it's your choice, and that's fine. Thank you for reading my development team thread.
Part of the website development team:
TheAmmoBandit (Codes PHP/HTML/CSS)

item.title: Need Website Development Team for my RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Cod3r_Crazy Cod3r Crazy
item.description:
@Cod3r_Crazy wrote:

Name: Mohammed
Age:15
Country: Norway
Position you are interested in: Administrator And Gfx | | Vbulletin Or Smf Only |
Experience: over 6 years with gfx
Hours Available to work each day/weekend/week: 2-3 a day- since its midt term exams.
Pictures of your work:

k34n6o.jpg800×250
34xgv0o.jpg1280×720

Skype/MSN: mystified91 / msn mohammedjanabi2@hotmail.com

  • I ONLY WORK IF YOU ARE 0-2 hours behind me im gmt +1 and +0

Read full topic

item.title: Need Website Development Team for my RSPS
item.dc:creator: @TheAmmoBandit TheAmmoBandit
item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

[quote=“skiller8860, post:8, topic:422705”][quote author=TheAmmoBandit link=topic=525368.msg3824834#msg3824834 date=1322088149]
Name: Michaël
Age: 16
Country: Belgium
Position you are interested in: PHP/HTML/CSS
Experience: A lot, i follow Web Developer and Multimedia at school.
Hours Available to work each day/weekend/week: 4-5 a day/5+ in the weekend
Pictures of your work: http://strikerzone.be/clan/ was my first ever made site, didn’t know about PHP then. Made 5 other sites after that. http://www.strikerzone.be/launcher (for my RSPS Client Launcher preview web)(they let me host it on their site). Currently working on a CMS, i can show you my CMS when i’m online at msn cause it isnt online (hosted offline). Other projects are at school
Skype/MSN: PM me for this
[/quote]
Accepted.[/quote]

Thx, PM me your MSN

Read full topic
